Name: Trend Micro Apex One
Author: Eli Forbes - v-eliforbes@microsoft.com
Description: _[Trend Micro Apex One](https://www.trendmicro.com/en_us/business/products/user-protection/sps/endpoint.html) protection offers advanced automated threat detection and response against an ever-growing variety of threats, including fileless and ransomware. The cross-generational blend of modern techniques provides highly tuned endpoint protection that maximizes performance and effectiveness.
